Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: Please pair with Saad, Latitia, or Brett on this.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/28952/ - Initial patch has been submitted here. Based on the comments provided by Matt, I have to re-write the script in declarative pipeline using global shared libraries.

Action.author: btl5037
Action.body: I believe with this last change, the fabric-lib-go pipeline is now complete. This last change was verified by the pipeline itself
